en.title: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
en.text: Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in [[Computer Science and Engineering]] with interests in Web Development, Database Systems, and Artificial Intelligence. Gained hands-on experience in full-stack development, Java, SQL, and Python through projects and coursework.

es.title: Licenciatura en Ingeniería Informática
es.text: Actualmente cursando una licenciatura en [[Ingeniería Informática]] con enfoque en desarrollo web, bases de datos e inteligencia artificial. Experiencia práctica adquirida a través de proyectos y cursos.

fr.title: Licence en Informatique
fr.text: En cours d'obtention d'une licence en [[Informatique]] avec des intérêts pour le développement web, les bases de données et l'intelligence artificielle. Expérience pratique obtenue via des projets académiques.

ko.title: 컴퓨터공학 학사
ko.text: [[웹 개발]], 데이터베이스 시스템 및 인공지능 분야에 관심을 가지고 있는 컴퓨터공학 학사 과정을 수강 중입니다. 프로젝트와 강의를 통해 Java, SQL, Python 기반의 실습 경험을 쌓았습니다.

en.title: Higher Secondary Education – Computer & Mathematics Stream
en.text: Completed [[Higher Secondary education]] in the Computer and Mathematics stream. Developed strong fundamentals in programming, logical reasoning, and analytical thinking. Participated in academic events, coding contests, and science exhibitions.

es.title: Educación Secundaria Superior – Rama de Computación y Matemáticas
es.text: Completé la [[educación secundaria superior]] en la rama de Computación y Matemáticas, adquiriendo una base sólida en programación y razonamiento lógico. Participé en concursos y exposiciones científicas.

fr.title: Enseignement Secondaire Supérieur – Filière Informatique et Mathématiques
fr.text: Terminé l'[[enseignement secondaire supérieur]] en informatique et mathématiques. Acquis des bases solides en programmation, raisonnement logique et résolution analytique. Participation à des événements académiques et concours scientifiques.

ko.title: 고등학교 교육 – 컴퓨터 및 수학 계열
ko.text: [[컴퓨터 및 수학 계열]]의 고등학교 과정을 이수하였으며, 프로그래밍 기초, 논리적 사고력, 분석 능력을 배양했습니다. 학술 대회 및 과학 전시회에 참여하였습니다.

en.title: SSLC – Secondary School Leaving Certificate
en.text: Completed [[SSLC]] with a focus on core subjects like Science, Mathematics, English, and Tamil. Built a strong academic foundation and participated in school-level competitions and cultural activities.

es.title: Certificado de Finalización de Escuela Secundaria (SSLC)
es.text: Completé el [[SSLC]] centrándome en materias como Ciencias, Matemáticas, Inglés y Tamil. Desarrollé una base académica sólida y participé en concursos escolares.

fr.title: Certificat de fin d'études secondaires (SSLC)
fr.text: Terminé le [[SSLC]] en me concentrant sur les matières principales telles que les sciences, les mathématiques, l’anglais et le tamoul. Participation active à des concours et événements scolaires.

ko.title: 중등학교 졸업 인증서 (SSLC)
ko.text: 과학, 수학, 영어, 타밀어 등의 핵심 과목을 중심으로 [[SSLC]] 과정을 이수하였습니다. 학업 기초를 튼튼히 다졌으며, 학교 대회와 문화 행사에도 적극 참여하였습니다.
